## Parser.extractMetadata() method

> This API is provided as a preview for developers and may change based on feedback that we receive. Do not use this API in a production environment.
> 

ExtractMetadata return metadata from JSON schema

**Signature:**

```typescript
static extractMetadata(schema: string | JSON): SchemaMetadata;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  schema | string &#124; JSON | JSON schema |

**Returns:**

[SchemaMetadata](./js-sdk.schemametadata.md)
